welcome_message_body: Welcome to Puerto Barrios, Guatemala! This charming coastal city is known for its beautiful beaches, vibrant culture, and delicious seafood. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Puerto Barrios has to offer.

restaurants.name: Restaurante Los Guichos
restaurants.description: Restaurante Los Guichos is a restaurant located in Puerto Barrios.
restaurants.address: Kilómetro 294.4 Carretera Jacobo Árbenz Guzmán, 18001- Puerto Barrios

restaurants.name: Restaurante Los Delfines
restaurants.description: Restaurante Los Delfines is a seafood restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Pollo Campero
restaurants.description: Pollo Campero is a fast food restaurant located in Puerto Barrios.

restaurants.name: El Safari
restaurants.description: El Safari is a seafood restaurant located in Puerto Barrios.

restaurants.name: Hotel La Cabaña
restaurants.description: Hotel La Cabaña is a caribbean restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Puerto Barrios Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.
